items.content_html: Parrot.js: A lightweight language-switching library for dynamic content translation. Seamlessly switch between languages on web pages. Effortlessly translate content within HTML elements like divs. Enhance user experience with customizable multilingual support. Easy integration for effortless language conversion.
items.title: dfralan/parrot: Parrot.js: A lightweight language-switching library for dynamic content translation. Seamlessly switch between languages on web pages. Effortlessly translate content within HTML elements like divs. Enhance user experience with customizable multilingual support. Easy integration for effortless language conversion.
